Projects

⚠️ This site is under active development

If there's something here you'd like to know more about sooner rather than later, reach out and I'll prioritize it accordingly!

Jump to: Virtual Gallery, Physical Gallery, Academic, Professional


Virtual Gallery

One-off creative coding projects, often small and interactive.
2024 Flock chorus

Built during a musical instrument hackathon while at the Recurse Center.

2024 Chrome extension: HTMLophone!

Sonify any website's DOM! Built as a creative coding exercise while at the Recurse Center.

2024 Chrome extension: Cat Friend!

Enjoy the experience of programming while a cat waves its tail in front of your screen! Built as a creative coding exercise while at the Recurse Center.

2024 Sketch: Wonderful world

Adapted from a creative coding exercise (prompt: What a wonderful world), co-created with David Brooks while at the Recurse Center.

2024 Yellow Scream (2024)

An interactive homage to Kim Beom's Yellow Scream (2012).

2024 Sketch: Sound ripples

A creative coding exercise (prompt: Particles, lots of them), co-created with Henderson Reed Hummel while at the Recurse Center.

2014 The Itinerant Mixer

Project for Music Hack Day Boston 2014, as written up by Evolver.fm in The Itinerant Mixer: Fun, Slick, and More Than a Toy .
Site currently offline.

Physical Gallery

Projects with a physical component.
2024 Music box punch card generation

With a Julia script followed by a Cuttle template, transform MIDI-notated music into music roll SVGs, which can then be cut with a laser cutter. Write-up TBD.

2024 HPGL.jl

Realtime audio visualization via pen plotter

2024 FlipDotsPi

Two electromagnetic flip-disc displays used as a persistent realtime weather display. Additionally used to play Steve Reich's Clapping Music, as discussed in blog post Clapping Music for two flip-disc displays.

2024 Assorted 2D CAD projects in Cuttle.xyz

Includes custom bookends, CAD pattern studies, and more, all designed in Cuttle. Described in blog post Obsessed with Cuttle: Parametric CAD for prototyping, producing, and procrastinating.

2023 Musidex

Write-up TBD

2021 Mix of the Month club [2021]

Write-up TBD

2022-3 Mini books (+script)

Write-up TBD
